ui.metaDescription: With love, solidarity and gratitude — information, memories and donations for Renade.

lines: No personal data is collected, no cookies are set, no tracking is used. No external fonts. Optional CDN is not used.
If you contact us by e-mail, data is processed by the mail provider.

about.text: Renade stood for solidarity, justice and warmth. She was active in the community and left traces of togetherness. This page collects memories, informs and invites support.

quotes.author: Friend
quotes.text: Renade showed me what it means to be there for each other.

testimonials.name: A.
testimonials.text: Thank you for your support in difficult times.

donate.transparency: We aim to collect €4,000–5,000. Exact costs are not yet final. Every euro will be used solely for funeral and remembrance. Any surplus will go to projects Renade was active in.
donate.paypalNote: Please use Friends & Family if possible.

faq.a: By bank transfer, PayPal or cash as listed above.
It goes to social projects Renade was active in.

faq.q: Who is responsible for the site?

faq.a: No. No cookies, no tracking, no forms.
